synopsis.text: This anime centers around Ancien, a mysterious girl who repeatedly appears in the dreams of Kokone. The origins of these dreams trace back to a fairy tale that Kokone's father told her when she was a little girl. This anime expands upon the fairy tale story, following Ancien's adventures in Kokone's dream world. As Ancien explores the fantastical dreamscape, she encounters magical beings and lands beyond imagination. Every night when Kokone falls asleep, she joins Ancien on these wondrous adventures. Through Ancien's eyes, Kokone discovers courage and wisdom that she carries back with her when she awakens. Full of imagination and whimsy, this anime promises to take viewers on an enchanting ride. Will the secrets of the fairy tale come to light? Can Ancien unlock mysteries in Kokone's dreams? Find out in this thrilling spin-off that expands the captivating tale first told in 'Hirune Hime: Shiranai Watashi no Monogatari.'
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
